text: All property of the Young Women's Christian Association of the District of Columbia located in the District of Columbia and occupied and used by such Association for its legitimate purposes shall be exempt from all national and municipal taxation so long as such property is so occupied and used.
historical:

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
